features: [more puzzle games] This is a classic plug and play game console released by FAMILY POCKET. [Delicate and cute] The delicate and compact exterior shape looks very cute and is loved by children. Easy to carry travel electronic toy with a mini body to take anywhere. Specifically tailored for children, it is easy to use and quick to start. Of course, this retro video game console can also take you back to your childhood memories. Perfect for relaxing on the way to work, during your free time. Play anytime, anywhere and enjoy your train childhood, plane, camping or travelling.

【Entertain Your Kids and Keep Them Busy】 : English language,simple arcade style,easy to play.It is a perfect partner to keep your kids occupied and have a good time of games playing .You can also enjoy fun games with your sweetheart and it would be so much fun for the whole family.

[Sturdy and Durable] The case of this handheld game console is made of strong and eco-friendly plastic. It is fingerprint and scratch resistant. After long testing and practical experience, it is strong enough to withstand everyday drops.

【Surprise Gift & Hassle-free Purchase】 It is cool and perfect as a gift for birthdays, Christmas, parties. If you have questions, please contact us. We can offer you a full refund or a free replacement within 30 days.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose this rs-16 handheld game console? Bring your own games: bring 260 interesting video games. Most games are educational games, which can better develop children's intelligence and logic ability and improve their hand eye coordination ability. Your child will like all kinds of games and will never be bored! 2.5-inch color HD screen, no blockage, no delay, super smooth, no need to download games, you can play when you get the games.
A great birthday present! Playing is a child's nature, but it will be a great and meaningful gift to let children not only enjoy the fun of play, but also exercise their hand eye coordination！

Bring different happiness to your family! Children like the happiness of playing together. Connect this video game console to the TV during family days and play with children. You will find that children are also very talented，can not only increase the emotional interaction with children, but also bring different happiness to your family!
What’s in the box ? 1 x RS-16 Game Console 1 x User manual 1 x AV Cable Note：Battery not included Giftbox Package Included

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun game for small price
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for a younger grandchild who wants to play with the big kids gamers but is too young not to break them. The games are pretty simple like the old atari games perhaps. I like that it takes batteries instead of recharge feature and younger grandson has played with this for several weeks now and happy to have his own little "game boy" toy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Can't save your place
reviews.reviewText: Kids like it, it's got a lot of games and levels. Problem if you get out you have to start from beginning of the whome game. And not just the beginning of the level you got out on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Screen goes blank while playing
reviews.reviewText: Thought this was a good little game to keep my 8year old off the television but this some what turned out to be the opposite. He started playing the games then all of a sudden the screen goes dark and then blanks out! Definitely not a good buy, so disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hand held game
reviews.reviewText: Great fun for my Grandson. Perfect size. He loved the color too. Lots of game options

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It has pretty cool games, the nostalgia while testing it out! It has all the great games you use to play as a kid back in the 70’s-early 2000’s BUT…With his parents permission, I bought this for my 5 year old nephew as a gift so he could learn the games and type of consoles we use to play when we were his age and so he could appreciate his whenever his parents decide to give him the expensive stuff. Told him he has to prove he can take care of his stuff so he can get the nice expensive stuff. Well with that said that dog gone console didn’t last him 3 days and not of his own doing. He was so upset he thought he did something wrong. 😐 I expected the thing not to last very long because let’s face it, you get what you pay for; but I wasn’t expecting it to last 3 days.When I tested it, it worked fine. The first day he played it we noticed a lot of the games were repetitive, different names but the same game and with glitches. So you’d have to find the games without the glitches. The longer he played it he said it started glitching the screen too and then just stopped working. You could hear the game playing but the screen didn’t work. He was on it about 2 hours the first day. The 2nd day about the same but with slight glitches and the third about 45 minutes before it completely gave out. Unfortunately, I can’t return it either because I bought it a month before I gave it to him. They’re from out of state. 😐
